text:
Rename is deprecated, but it is needed to rename a folder.
Using Move does not rename the folder, it creates a new one, w/o the folders and files in the old one.
This happened whether I used fileset, or file.

Please keep Rename :)
creator: patricia_shan8@hotmail.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
Hmm,

seems to work using

<project>

  <mkdir dir="${java.io.tmpdir}/foo/bar"/>
  <touch file="${java.io.tmpdir}/foo/baz"/>

  <move file="${java.io.tmpdir}/foo"
        tofile="${java.io.tmpdir}/xyzzy"/>
</project>

stefan@birdy:~$ ant -f /tmp/test.xml 
Buildfile: /tmp/test.xml
    [mkdir] Created dir: /tmp/foo/bar
    [touch] Creating /tmp/foo/baz

BUILD SUCCESSFUL
Total time: 0 seconds

stefan@birdy:~$ ls /tmp/xyzzy/
bar  baz
